name: @okta/okta.github.io
description: NPM dependencies for testing and building developer.okta.com

scripts.stop: if-env CI=true && exit 0 || (pkill -f clean && kill $(lsof -t -i:4000; lsof -t -i:4444))
scripts.sync-assets: git fetch --force origin master:master && git clone -b master . dist && rsync -r _source/_assets/img/ ./dist/assets/img/
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && npm run sync-assets && npm run generate build --verbose
scripts.pretest: npm run generate serve -- --no-watch & wait-on http://localhost:4000 && webdriver-manager update --gecko false

author: Joel Franusic <joel.franusic@okta.com>
